meanings.definition: A person who talks persuasively, especially in order to deceive or impress others.
meanings.sent1: The spieler convinced everyone to buy his fake potions.
meanings.sent2: The spieler at the market was able to sell ice to an Eskimo.
meanings.sent3: The spieler's tall tales were so unbelievable, they became a local legend.
meanings.sent4: His smooth-talking ways made him the spieler of the town.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the spieler who promises too much and delivers too little.

meanings.definition: A person who performs in a show or play, especially in a loud and exaggerated manner.
meanings.sent1: The spieler on stage captivated the audience with his dramatic gestures.
meanings.sent2: The spieler in the circus juggled flaming torches with ease.
meanings.sent3: The spieler's over-the-top performance left everyone in stitches.
meanings.sent4: She was the spieler of the theater, stealing the spotlight with every act.
meanings.sent5: The spieler's grand entrance set the tone for the entire show.
